titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3394) to authorize funding for computer and network security research and development and research fellowship programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-357, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3394 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 122.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 343.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 392 - 0 (Roll no. 12).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/5/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 3394 (cyber security research and development funding authorization).
